name: Dad + Son
description:
Dad + Son is a minimalist 2D platformer game where you control two characters (Dad and Son) at the same time.

You can control the two characters with WASD and arrow keys.

Theoretically it can also be played by two different players, but the main idea was that you need to care about both characters.

The game is inspired by indie classics like "Thomas was Alone" and "Brothers: A Tale of two Sons" and it was made during the Global Game Jam 2022 in Cagliari, Italy.

A game by Tio (Francesco Laddomada)

Music and sound by Giuliano Cau
